sentences.en: But who has the hardihood to read them?
He had the hardihood to deny the fact.
I hardly believe any of our opponents will have the hardihood to say they are not.
sentences.cn: 我很难相信,反对我们的人中有谁敢说她们不是.

sentences.en: I scarcely believe any of our opponents will have the hardihood to say they are not.
sentences.cn: 我不相信任何反对我们的人有胆量说她们不是人们.

sentences.en: Jack had the hardihood to deny what he has done.
sentences.cn: 杰克厚颜地否认了自己所干的事.

sentences.en: Purple: Stand for valiancy , hardihood, honesty, strong and brave.
sentences.cn: 紫色: 表现骁勇 、 刚毅 、 正直 、 坚强、胆大.

words.tran_cn: 大胆；强壮；耐劳性；耐寒性
刚毅，大胆；厚颜；胆大无敌
